description_clean:
Explore the untouched beauty of Nyungwe National Park in Rwanda on this immersive 3-day tour. Stay at the luxurious One & Only Nyungwe Resort, nestled in the heart of the rainforest. Sept 18th â€“ 31st, 2025
Package Duration:
Full-Day Excursion
Package Overview:
Embark on an unforgettable journey into the heart of natureâ€™s majesty as you come face to face with the extraordinary mountain gorillas. Delve into the lush emerald embrace of Volcanoes National Park, where adventure and conservation intertwine. Trek through ancient rainforests pulsating with life, guided by seasoned experts, to witness the magnificent beings that call this sanctuary home.

Private road transfer from your hotel in Kigali to Volcanoes National Park, departing at 04:20 am.

name: 2-Day Nights Akagera: Explore the Wild in Luxury
seller_bio: Luxury safari operator headquartered in Kigali, Rwanda. Delivers bespoke, authentic safari experiences across East Africa—including gorilla trekking, big-game safaris, walking and helicopter safaris—emphasizing personalized, high-end service.
description_clean:
Event Dates:
Sept 21st â€“ 23rd, 2025
Package Duration:
2 Days / 1 Night
Package Overview:
Embark on an exhilarating game drive to encounter elephants, lions, giraffes, buffalos, and more. Delve into the heart of the parkâ€™s wilderness on a serene boat safari along Lake Ihema, where the waters teem with hippos, stealthy crocodiles, and a dazzling array of birdlife. After each dayâ€™s adventure, retreat to Akagera Mantis Game Lodge, where rustic charm meets modern comfort. Experience the wonders of Akagera National Park and create memories to last a lifetime on this extraordinary journey into the heart of Africa.
Itinerary:
Day 1: Kigali â€“ Akagera National Park (Game Drive)

Pick up from the hotel (5:00 AM) and drive to Akagera National Park.

Stop for breakfast/snacks.

Arrive at the park (8:30 AM) for briefing, then start game drive at (9:00 AM).

Lunch break (12:30 PM) and check-in at hotel.

Resume game drive (2:00 PM).

Arrive at Akagera Mantis to unwind (4:30 PM).

Guided night game drive (5:30 PM).

Dinner and overnight stay (8:00 PM).

Day 2: Akagera National Park (Boat Ride)

Breakfast and check out (8:00 AM).

Head to Lake Ihema for boat ride (9:00 AM).

Game drive towards the north (10:00 AM).

Lunch at Lake Mihindi Restaurant (1:00 PM).

Depart and drive back to Kigali (3:00 PM).

Inclusions:

Professional driver guide.

Accommodation at the Park Resort on full board basis (drinks included).

Drinking water in the vehicle.

All activities and meals in itinerary.

Guided game drive and park entrance fees.

Our assistance.

Exclusions:

Souvenirs, tips, personal expenses.

Drinks not mentioned in itinerary.

Travel insurance.

name: 2-Day Rwanda Chimpanzee Trekking and Canopy Walk Tour
seller_bio: Luxury safari operator headquartered in Kigali, Rwanda. Delivers bespoke, authentic safari experiences across East Africa—including gorilla trekking, big-game safaris, walking and helicopter safaris—emphasizing personalized, high-end service.
description_clean:
Event Dates:
Sept 18th â€“ 31st, 2025
Package Duration:
2 Days / 1 Night
Package Overview:
The Rwanda Chimpanzee and Canopy Walk Tour offers an unforgettable journey through Nyungwe National Park, renowned for its captivating natural beauty and rich wildlife. This biodiverse rainforest, believed to have endured since the ice age, provides a unique opportunity to observe chimpanzees in their natural habitat. The adventure also includes a thrilling canopy walk, giving you an elevated perspective above the forest canopy to fully immerse yourself in this remarkable ecosystem.
Itinerary:
Day 1:

Transfer from your hotel in Kigali to the airport for your flight to Rusizi with Rwandair.

Upon arrival, your driver-guide will transfer you to Nyungwe National Park for the canopy walk tour.

After the tour, drive to One & Only Nyungwe House, check in, and enjoy lunch.

Spend the afternoon at leisure, followed by dinner and an overnight stay.

Day 2:

Early morning breakfast.

Transfer to Nyungwe National Park for your chimpanzee trekking experience.

Return to the lodge for lunch.

After lunch, drive back to Kigali, arriving in the evening.

Inclusions:

Exclusive use of a private 4x4 & professional driver guide.

Accommodation as per itinerary.

Meals in the program.

Chimpanzee trekking permit.

Canopy walkway permit.

One-way air ticket to Rusizi with Rwandair.

Bottled mineral water in the vehicle during the tour.

Government taxes.

Emergency Medical Evacuation Insurance.

Our assistance.

Exclusions:

International flights.

Travel insurance.

Visa fees.

Mini-bar and drinks throughout the trip.

Personal expenses.

description_raw:
Event Dates: Sept 21st â€“ 28th 2025
Package Duration: 2Days / 1Nights

Package Overview:

- Embark on a journey like no other, where youâ€™ll
encounter the awe-inspiring world of the mountain
gorillas in Rwanda. 2-Day Safari Experience
Unforgettable Gorilla is a meticulously crafted
itinerary that promises an unforgettable experience
combining culture, history, and wildlife in one
remarkable adventure.

Itinerary:

Day 1: Transfer from Kigali to Volcanoes NP- Visit Ellen
Campus
- Pick up from your hotel (Place to be advised) Meet
your guide and transfer by road from Kigali to
Volcanoes national park a stunning three-hour drive
north among the lush, green landscape of the
countryside. The landscape of Volcanoes National
Park is incredible with a spectacular line of
volcanoes far into the distance.
- Proceed with a visit to Ellen Campus and learn more
about conservation in Africa and how the campus
helps to educate tourists and local communities on
the importance of conserving gorillas as well as
provide a state-of-the-art facility to train the next
generation of conservationists.
- Check in and lunch at your Lodge.
- Afternoon leisure at the lodge as you prepare for
your Gorilla trekking
- Overnight at Five Volcanoes Boutique â€“ 1 x Double
deluxe Room (FB)

Day 2: Gorilla trekking in Volcanoes national park.
- Early Morning breakfast, meet your guide and drive
transfer to the park headquarters where briefing,
porters and tea and coffee will be given before
starting the adventure into the forest.
- We offer complementary Local porters who can help
with the guide to complete the gorilla tracking
experience. Who will assist you with your daypack,
and give you hand when the path is slippery, steep,
or irregular.
- Your guide will drive you to the starting point:
Tracking can be between 90 minutes and the whole
morning depending on what family group is assigned.

Your experience begins with a private transfer from Kigali to Volcanoes National Park for an unforgettable Golden Monkey Trek, followed by check-in at Tiloreza Volcanoes Ecolodge and a visit to the Ellen DeGeneres Campus of the Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund, where youâ€™ll learn about groundbreaking conservation work and contribute to the cause. Day two brings the life-changing thrill of Mountain Gorilla Trekking, a celebration lunch, and a scenic transfer to Lake Kivu for a magical sunset kayaking session over its calm, shimmering waters, before an overnight stay at the elegant Lake Kivu Serena Hotel. On your final day, embrace the excitement of mountain biking from Rubavu through picturesque lakeside landscapes, pause for a refreshing lunch by the lake, and then enjoy a private transfer back to Kigali. This all-inclusive package covers trekking permits, guided activities, sunset kayaking, mountain biking, comfortable accommodation, meals, snacks, drinking water, expert driver-guide services, and government taxesâ€”allowing you to focus entirely on the beauty, culture, and adventure that Rwanda has to offer. (Excludes health and travel insurance, visas, flights, optional activities, $20 Ellen DeGeneres Campus donation per person, tips, and personal expenses.)
